questions.question: What is the name of your organization or product?
questions.description: Used in the document header to identify the scope of these coding standards

questions.question: When should the 'Last Updated' date be set?
questions.description: Tracks when this document was last revised

questions.question: What code elements need naming conventions defined?
questions.description: Define how each type of code element should be named

questions.question: What are your testing requirements?
questions.description: Specify which tests are mandatory and their requirements

questions.question: Who owns this coding standards document?
questions.description: Identifies the team responsible for maintaining this document

questions.question: Who is the intended audience for these coding standards?
questions.description: Lists the teams or roles that should follow these standards

questions.question: What is the specific purpose of your coding standards?
questions.placeholder: Define consistent coding standards to improve code quality, readability, security, and maintainability
questions.description: Describes why these standards are being established
